LanguageData.Alien_Jaffa_Base.label: jaffa
LanguageData.Alien_Jaffa_Base.description: Slaves of the Goa'uld, the Jaffa are humans from many different worlds, most of whom have been implanted with larval Goa'uld symbiotes. Jaffa have a great sense of honor and nobility backing their oppressed history. Due to their oppression by the Goa'uld, many have become strong and self-sufficient on the battlefield.
LanguageData.Alien_Jaffa_Base.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_Jaffa_Base.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Alien_Jaffa_Base.tools.2.label: head
